actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology

official_title: To provide for the redesign of the reverse of the Lincoln 1-cent coin in 2009 in commemoration of the 200th anniversary of the birth of President Abraham Lincoln.
short_title: Abraham Lincoln Bicentennial 1-Cent Coin Redesign Act

summary.text: Abraham Lincoln Bicentennial 1-Cent Coin Redesign Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury, during 2009, to issue one-cent coins with the reverse side bearing four different designs representing different aspects of the life of Abraham Lincoln.

titles.title: Abraham Lincoln Bicentennial 1-Cent Coin Redesign Act
To provide for the redesign of the reverse of the Lincoln 1-cent coin in 2009 in commemoration of the 200th anniversary of the birth of President Abraham Lincoln.
